attributes.action: Scrap the Tv Licence as you can watch bbc programmes free online
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should we have to pay a tv licence fee when you can watch bbc programmes free online on their iplayer service?

rejection.details: Without the TV licence fee, the BBC would not be able to make programmes which are then made available online.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
